title: Configuration of an L3 Packet Forwarding pipeline

pipeline.description: name of the pipeline, must be set to l3fwd

fakedrop.description: whether to actually drop unmatched packets (False) or send them immediately to the output port (True) for correct rate measurements

upstream-l3-table-size.description: Number of destination entries (prefixes) in the L3FIB lookup table, upstream direction

upstream-group-table-size.description: number of group table entries (next-hops), upstream direction

downstream-l3-table-size.description: Number of destination entries (prefixes) in the L3FIB lookup table, upstream direction

downstream-group-table-size.description: number of group table entries (next-hops), upstream direction

fluct-l3-table.description: number of l3-table-update events in the L3FIB per sec

fluct-group-table.description: number of group-table-update events in the Group Table per sec
